title: MaxGreen MGO-W6KSE 6KVA Standard Backup High-Frequency Online UPS
cat_seo_title: MaxGreen UPS price in Bangladesh |Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy MaxGreen Online UPS at best price in Bangladesh. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
MaxGreen MGO-W6KSE 6KVA Standard Backup High-Frequency Online UPS

The MaxGreen MGO-W6KSE is a high-frequency online UPS that provides reliable backup power to electronic devices during power outages or voltage fluctuations. With a rated power of 6KVA/5.4KW, it is capable of supporting standard loads for 15-30 minutes. The UPS features a single-phase input voltage ranging from 120Vac to 288Vac, with a frequency of 45Hz-65Hz. It has a high power factor of >=0.99 for single-phase and >0.95 for three-phase, which ensures efficient use of power. The output voltage is a single-phase 220Vac, which is a stable and reliable power supply. The sinewave type of wave ensures that the power supply is clean and without distortion. The UPS uses an IGBT rectifier, which is an efficient and reliable rectifier type. The UPS has a noise level of less than 55dB, which makes it suitable for use in different environments. The UPS comes with an internal battery cabinet that contains 16 units of Always/Star/Equivalent brand batteries, each with a capacity of 12v 9Ah. The charging capability is greater than 6 hours for 90% recharging of the standard model. The UPS has a transfer time of 00, which means that there is no break in the power supply during a power outage. The UPS is ideal for use in small to medium-sized businesses that require a reliable power supply for their electronic devices.

full_description:
MaxGreen B6KS/L 6kVA Low-Frequency Online UPS

The MaxGreen series UPS guarantee total protection for powers ranging from 6kVA against any anomaly in the mains electricity network during their operation. The MaxGreen B6KS/L 6kVA Online UPS includes active input PFC rectifier (Power Factor Corrector) and makes use of the advantages of PWM technology with IGTBs to obtain equipment with high technology features. With On-Line Double Conversion technology, the supply voltage to loads is provided in each case via the inverter stage with galvanic isolation. Advanced PWM Technology allows a voltage and current-adjusted signal to be available at each moment in time, free of harmonics, noises, and interferences. Information on the status of the system is presented locally by means of LED signaling and an LCD screen with different menus. Information on the unit can also be managed remotely through its powerful software.

title: MaxGreen MGO-W10KSE 10KVA Standard Backup High-Frequency Online UPS
cat_seo_title: MaxGreen UPS price in Bangladesh |Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy MaxGreen Online UPS at best price in Bangladesh. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
MaxGreen MGO-W10KSE 10KVA Standard Backup High-Frequency Online UPS

The MaxGreen MGO-W10KSE is a high-performance, standard backup, high-frequency online UPS designed to protect electronic equipment from any irregularities in the main power network. With a rated power of 10KVA/9.0KW, this UPS is capable of delivering a reliable and stable power supply to connected devices, ensuring uninterrupted operation even in the event of power failures or voltage fluctuations. This UPS is equipped with 16 units of a 12V 9Ah battery, which provides a backup time of >6 hours for 90% of the ordinary model's recharge, making it an ideal choice for critical applications that require extended backup power. The MaxGreen MGO-W10KSE uses On-Line Double Conversion technology, which ensures that the inverter stage with galvanic isolation supplies the supply voltage to loads in every scenario. This technology provides a voltage and current-regulated signal that is free of harmonics, noise, and interferences, thereby ensuring that sensitive equipment is protected from power surges and other electrical disturbances. The advanced PWM technology used in this UPS ensures that the output waveform is a pure sine wave, providing an efficient and stable power supply to connected devices. The system status is communicated through LED signaling and an LCD panel with several menus, allowing users to monitor the UPS's performance and make any necessary adjustments. The MaxGreen MGO-W10KSE also comes with robust software that allows for remote management of information, providing users with the ability to monitor and manage their UPS systems from anywhere in the world. Overall, the MaxGreen MGO-W10KSE is a reliable, high-performance, and feature-rich UPS that is ideal for a wide range of critical applications.

full_description:
MaxGreen MGO-W3033-LF 30000VA Online UPS

The MaxGreen MGO-W3033-LF 30000VA Online UPS is the pinnacle of power backup technology, carefully designed to deliver continuous power to important systems and equipment in large-scale applications. With an input voltage range of 380V ±25%, this three-phase UPS is compatible with a wide range of power sources, ensuring constant and dependable power production regardless of fluctuations or disruptions in the electrical supply. This UPS has a remarkable load capacity of 24000W, allowing it to handle even the most demanding power requirements with ease. Whether in data centers, industrial facilities, or other mission-critical locations, the MaxGreen MGO-W3033-LF provides continuous and steady power to keep everything operating smoothly. With a backup period of up to 30 minutes at full load, this UPS gives you enough time to perform system shutdown processes or install backup power solutions in the case of a long-term outage. Its three-phase input and output arrangement, paired with an on-line double conversion rectifier type with galvanic isolation, ensuring that connected equipment receives clean, regulated power with no fluctuations or distortions. The UPS has extensive protection features to protect connected equipment, such as overload protection, which can handle up to 125% load for 10 minutes and 150% load for 60 seconds. Furthermore, the system achieves high efficiency levels of over 92%, decreasing energy waste and lowering operating expenses. The MaxGreen MGO-W3033-LF is designed for adaptability and dependability, with external battery racks housed in solid metal cabinets that can be easily expanded to increase backup durations as needed. This UPS is designed to function in a variety of climatic circumstances, including an operating temperature range of 0 to 40 degrees Celsius, humidity tolerance of 0-95%, and altitude tolerance of up to 1000 meters above sea level. This guarantees that performance and dependability are ideal in a variety of operating situations. The MaxGreen MGO-W3033-LF 30000VA Online UPS is a strong, efficient, and trustworthy power backup system that provides unrivaled dependability and peace of mind for important applications that require continuous power.

full_description:
MaxGreen W4033-LF 40KVA Online UPS

The MaxGreen W4033-LF 40KVA Online UPS is a reliable and sophisticated power backup solution for important systems and equipment in harsh situations. With a load capability of up to 125% for 10 minutes and 150% for 30 seconds, this UPS provides a dependable safety net during periods of high demand or unexpected power surges, ensuring uninterrupted operation. The W4033-LF has an input voltage range of 380±25% V and maintains a constant output voltage of 380/400/415±1% despite power changes. This functionality is critical for shielding sensitive equipment from voltage fluctuations and maintaining constant performance under all operational situations. As an online UPS, the W4033-LF uses a twofold conversion process, converting incoming AC power to DC and then back to AC. This procedure assures that the connected equipment receives a clean and reliable power supply that is free of fluctuations, spikes, and other electrical issues. This degree of security is required to protect important systems from potential harm or data loss due to power outages. One of the MaxGreen W4033-LF's most notable characteristics is its ability to automatically pick the synchronization range based on the grid frequency. This provides smooth interaction with multiple power systems, improving overall dependability and performance, particularly in areas with variable grid frequencies. The UPS includes extensive monitoring and management capabilities that allow users to remotely check power status, battery health, and system performance. This proactive approach to power management allows users to recognize and fix possible problems before they worsen, reducing downtime and increasing productivity. The MaxGreen W4033-LF 40KVA Online UPS, with its rugged build, innovative features, and exceptional performance, offers the greatest peace of mind for critical applications that require dependable power backup. Whether in data centers, healthcare institutions, or industrial settings, this UPS provides unrivaled dependability, assuring the ongoing functioning and protection of vital equipment and systems.
